title.part1: We champion AI sovereignty to unlock innovation and growth in Europe

hero.description: EU-compliant inference service and AI infrastructure built by developers for developers.

hero.title: About Berget AI
hero.description: We champion AI sovereignty to unlock innovation and growth.

origin.title: Our Story
origin.description: We realised that many organisations are held back in their pursuit of AI by a range of obstacles. Some struggle with legal and regulatory challenges, others simply don’t have the skills or capital to train, host and serve their own AI models. Many are reluctant to invest upfront in GPUs or lack access to local language-capable large language models. That’s why we built Berget AI – to unlock the full potential of AI for innovation and growth by championing sovereign, open and sustainable AI.
origin.nameOrigin: The name is Swedish for "mountain", which we have plenty of in Sweden, many of which host underground Data Centers. So why have your data in the cloud when you can have in "Berget"?

openSource.title: Open Source & Community
openSource.description: We are passionate about Open Source and Community Driven Innovation and are true believers that open source is key for safe, transparent and cost efficient AI in the future. History has plenty of examples where a determined community can overcome seemingly impossible obstacles, innovate new tools and create worldwide standards, that are open, interoperable and accessible and affordable for all.

european.title: European Innovation
european.description: We are passionate about European competitiveness overall, and in particular in the field of AI. Europe needs to have its own AI agenda, innovation system and sovereignty, especially in an increasingly volatile geopolitical context. It needs to be enabled by EU and its members states, and driven by businesses, organisations and communities.

integrity.title: Integrity & Privacy
integrity.description: We think integrity, data privacy and regulations are good as long as it ensures a level playing field, fosters simplicity over complexity and ensures openness and broad participation. We want to be a key enabler for European organizations and unlock AI innovations in a safe and responsible way.

promises.title: Our Customer Promises
promises.description: What you can expect when working with us
list: An easy way to build AI applications
Affordable and fair, no lock-ins, no hidden fees
A simple way to be compliant to key regulatory frameworks
Developer friendly, built by developers for developers
In constant state of innovation and listen to what our customers need
Contributing to positive and sustainable societal progress

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are entrepreneurs with decades of experience in technology and AI

christian.name: Christian Landgren
christian.bio: 30 years of experience helping organizations with digitalization and AI, passionate about AI and software development, deeply engaged in open source and open innovations, trusted advisor to government and public sector, challenger and technology optimist

andreas.name: Andreas Lundmark
andreas.bio: Andreas was an integral part of building the AI capabilities and offering at Boston Consulting Group (BCG Gamma) where he led the Nordic team and was globally responsible for the "AI at Scale" topic, and led multiple large scale data and AI transformations at leading global brands

john.name: John Angelmo
john.bio: A networking and kubernetes wizard with extensive experience in building and managing large-scale Kubernetes based infrastructure

johan.name: Johan Lahti
johan.bio: A leading Data Center network designer and builder who has helped leading enterprises and scale-ups build global multi-site datacenter deployments

sara.name: Sara Alsén
sara.bio: Sara has over 25 years of experience of building brands with purpose through impactful communication - for start-ups and multinationals.

oscar.name: Oscar Virot
oscar.bio: Tech and support for everything related to networks and servers. 20+ years of experience in sysadmin, network, and server operations

hero.title: Why Choose Berget AI?
hero.description: No dependencies, no legal exposure, no data retention

benefits.title: Benefits of Berget AI
benefits.description: We serve (public and private sector) organisations that seek to harness the power of AI with full control and with a minimum impact on the planet.

euBased.title: Sovereign AI
euBased.description: Run models while all data stays within EU borders, our infrastructure is all in Europe, with full compliance with EU regulations.

sustainable.title: Sustainable AI
sustainable.description: Our infrastructure is built with sustainability in focus, from fossil-free electricity to heat recovery and circular hardware.

flexible.title: (truly) Open AI
flexible.description: We are champions of open innovation and we host and serve open models. Our services are fully built on open source.

european.title: European Innovation and Data Sovereignty
european.description: At Berget AI, we empower European companies to innovate without compromises. We're building a future where Europe leads in secure and ethical AI solutions.
points: Your data, your models, your infrastructure — all in one secure, compliant place
We promote open innovation within the EU and drive AI and data sovereignty
Join us in shaping a future where Europe leads in secure, ethical AI solutions

privacy.title: Simple Data Privacy and Compliance
privacy.description: Navigating data protection laws is complex—we make it simple. Our infrastructure is built to meet the strictest European regulations.
points: Store your data, host your applications, and run your inference - all in one place!
All data stays within our EU-based servers and never leaves our infrastructure
Ensure compliance with GDPR and other regulatory frameworks by design

alternative.title: Alternative to On-Prem and Public Cloud
alternative.description: When public cloud isn't an option, Berget AI is your secure and scalable alternative. We combine the benefits of cloud services and on-premises solutions.
points: Perfect for companies with sensitive data that can't be stored on public cloud infrastructure
No limitations — process even sensitive data freely with our LLMs
No upfront investments—start small and scale as your needs grow

security.title: Built-in Security and Privacy
security.description: Our infrastructure is designed to protect your data at every step. We've built security from the ground up, not as an afterthought.
points: Developed with OWASP standards to ensure highest level security
Inference runs entirely within our secure network—your data never traverses the internet
Zero retention — your data is never stored or retained

cta.title: Ready to Build with Berget AI?
cta.description: No up front investments, no hidden costs, no lock-ins.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Pay for exactly what you use. Choose a plan that fits your needs, and scale up as your usage grows.
pricing.moneyBackDescription: The above price plans include pre-paid compute and tokens at a discount compared to list price. Any usage above the included amount is charged on top, and any remaining balance is rolled over to the next month.
moneyBackBullets: Credit Card pre-payment for all plans
Automatic top-up of wallet at a set threshold
pricing.moneyBackNote: Prices above are for monthly pre-payments. Yearly payments come with a 10% extra discount to the above price plans.

section.title: Plans for Every Need
section.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

footer.description: Berget AI champions AI sovereignty to unlock innovation and growth in Europe. Founded in Sweden in 2024, Berget AI offers inference and AI infrastructure for private and public sector organisations.

partnerQuotes.title: Why do we need Berget?
partnerQuotes.description: We asked some of Sweden's leading experts in law and data security about why a Swedish cloud service for AI and sensitive data handling is needed.

quotes.name: Jim Runsten
quotes.title: CEO Synch Law Firm
quotes.quote: With a Swedish cloud provider, administrative work and regulatory risk decrease as there is no third-country transfer, eliminating the need to stay updated with third-country transfer regulations, adequacy decisions, or conduct impact assessments. Furthermore, you get a provider that must comply with the same legislation that applies to you, meaning much of the documentation will be prepared by the provider in a way that's already adapted to Swedish conditions.

quotes.name: Ann-Marie Eklund Löwinder
quotes.title: one of Sweden's leading IT security experts
quotes.quote: Berget's approach with reused hardware is smart from both a sustainability and security perspective. By building the system with the assumption that things can break, vulnerability is reduced. Many of today's cyber attacks exploit the fact that many servers remain untouched for too long without important security updates.

quotes.name: André Catry
quotes.title: Senior Advisor in IT/Information Security and Cyber Risk, Kahn Pedersen Law Firm
quotes.quote: Data is today one of the most valuable assets that exists. It's a reasonable business decision to train AI models in services that don't use your data to train someone else's models.

SustainabilitySection.title: Our sustainability promise
SustainabilitySection.description: We are building Europe’s most sustainable AI infrastructure. Our environmental commitment is foundational to our operations, not an afterthought.

points.title: 100% Fossil-Free Electricity
points.description: Our data centers run exclusively on certified fossil-free energy from Sweden’s unique energy mix of hydropower, wind power, nuclear, and rooftop solar.

points.title: Circular Hardware
points.description: We use circular hardware as much as possible to reduce emissions from production. Our servers have extended lifecycles through certified reuse processes.

points.title: CO₂e Tracking
points.description: Each AI request includes CO₂e emission data per response from our APIs and summaries, helping developers choose the most energy-efficient model.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: Have questions about Berget AI? Our team is here to help.

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.title: Inference and AI Infrastructure for Developers and DevOps Teams
hero.description: Run your AI models and applications in a secure, EU-based environment with full control over your code and data.

sections.title: GitOps-Based Infrastructure
sections.description: Skip complex Terraform scripts and the AWS console. Define your infrastructure using simple YAML files in your Git repo.
bullets: Automatic sync – changes in your repo are automatically applied to your infrastructure
Version control – full history and ability to roll back changes
Portability – your infrastructure is defined as code and can be moved between environments
CI/CD integration – connect with your existing CI/CD pipelines

sections.title: OpenAI-Compatible API
sections.description: Use the same code and libraries you're already using with OpenAI, but with full control over your data.
bullets: Minimal code change – just switch your API key and endpoint to migrate from OpenAI
Support for popular libraries – works with LangChain, LlamaIndex and other frameworks
GDPR-compliant – all data stays within the EU and is never stored
CO₂ tracking – get carbon emission data for every API call

sections.title: Kubernetes Without the Complexity
sections.description: Get the benefits of Kubernetes without having to manage the infrastructure yourself.
bullets: Preconfigured clusters – get started in minutes instead of days
Standardised Helm charts – install databases, caching and services with a single command
GPU support – run your own models on dedicated GPUs when needed
Autoscaling – automatically scale up and down based on demand

sections.title: Developer Tools That Simplify
sections.description: Tools to help you build, test, and deploy your AI applications faster.
bullets: CLI tools – manage your resources directly from the terminal
Logging and monitoring – built-in integration with Prometheus and Grafana
Cost tracking – see exactly what costs and optimize your resources
Developer environments – preconfigured environments for rapid development

cta.title: Ready to Start Building?
cta.description: Get started in under 5 minutes with our CLI tool and build your first AI application.

modelPage.title: Model Library
modelPage.intro: At Berget AI, we're committed to providing the most powerful open models available, carefully selected to enable our customers to build and deploy sophisticated AI applications. Our model library is designed with the following principles in mind:
principles: We provide access to the most powerful open source models, ensuring you have the power, speed and cost-efficiency needed for advanced AI development.
In supporting AI Sovereignty for Europe - we especially want to provide models that are multilingual and support European languages and understanding of our values
Our carefully curated selection balances performance, speed, and cost across different model types and sizes, helping you find the perfect fit for your needs.
Our comprehensive range of models is specifically chosen to support the development and deployment of sophisticated agentic applications on our platform.
modelPage.continuous: We're continuously evaluating and adding new models to our library, ensuring you always have access to the latest advancements in Opensource models.
modelPage.suggestion: Have a specific model in mind? Get in touch!

serverlesspricing.title: Serverless Inference
serverlesspricing.intro: Access our comprehensive selection of AI models through our OpenAI compliant API. Pay only for what you use with no upfront commitments.

multimodal.title: Multimodal Models

stt.note: Prices are per 1000 minutes of voice input. Billed on per second intervals.

serverlesspricing.footer: All prices are in EUR and exclude VAT.
